title: I am willing to study mechanical engineering which is being studied by students in 1st year. Which book would you recommend to make a base? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are as dedicated as it appears from the question, then you dont need to worry much about having a base before you start.If you show this dedication during your course at college it will be very much sufficient for your studies. I will suggest you to enjoy this vacation because after  that your vacations might be spent thinking about career , internships and stuff (and they should be perhaps in a way) . Good luck

You cannot just study mechanical engineering if you r stdying it with a motive of gaining a degree then you have to give entrance exam n qualifyAnd if u want to read mechanical engg books just fr knowledge then here are someApplied Mathematics - KumbhojkarMechanics Engineering drawing by VM Panchalthese r a few subjects to start with
